statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} -3 \\ -3 \\ 0 \\ 3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 3 \\ 2 \\ -2 \\ -2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -6 \\ -3 \\ 6 \\ 3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -9 \\ -3 \\ 12 \\ 3 \end{array}\right]\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
